main.bio: I am a software engineer with a passion for solving problems and helping people. I have experience using a wide variety of technologies such as Python, Javascript, SQL, Linux, and more. Feel free to reach out through my email or Linkedin!
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here are the skills that I've used at work and in projects

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Electrical Engineering

work.title: Software Integration Test Engineer
descriptions: Test and integrate web and mobile streaming applications for airlines around the world
Utilize Linux commands and tools to debug inflight entertainment systems
Configure systems according to wiring diagrams and customer requirements
Demonstrate performance and functionality of systems to customers

work.title: Engineering Intern
descriptions: Test multiple Broadcom Ethernet products for quality assurance and durability
Operated various electrical equipment including oscilloscopes and network analyzers

projects.title: Budgetting Application
projects.description: Application to categorize transactions when their posted using Plaid API

projects.title: Pizza Website
projects.description: Website that allows users to order menu items and for admins to update menu utilizing Django Admin system

projects.title: Chat Application
projects.description: Single page application that allows users to talk to others in a channel utilizing Flask's Socket Library

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: Single page application that allows users to view my projects and work history

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
